divs: Sighting DetailsObserver was standing on her porch at night and observed a very small white light emitting an extremely intense white beam towards the ground. Craft was at about 300-400 ft above the ground. Absolutely no noise was being emitted from the craft. The light beam was completely vertical, and the carft and light beam were making a continuous circling motion of about 100ft in diameter. The observer was less than 300ft from the ground where the light beam was shining, but that area was obscured by trees and a nother house. The craft made this motion for 30 minutes, and then vanished from sight. Observer was mildly scared, but no abnormal feelings were observed. Observer while female, 28, educated (Master's degree) and excellent health.
trends: There has been one other sighting in Randleman
There were no other sightings in Randleman on or around September 28th 2007
